search_gui.c File Reference

Detailed Description

initialises and handles user dialog to search and select parts

GtkWidget* create_main_search_window (  void   ) 
 

creates upper part of search dialog and calls create_search_results_section.

currently pressing top/bottom parts results in a selection of parts on top/bottom of the circuit board only, incase there was no selection all top/bottom parts are shown
tooltips are also created here.

Definition at line 391 of file search_gui.c.

References _InterfaceStruct::bottom_parts_selection, _InterfaceStruct::check_comment, _InterfaceStruct::check_designator, click_find_cb(), completion_model, create_search_results_section(), _InterfaceStruct::file_is_named_entry, file_is_named_entry_key_press_cb(), _InterfaceStruct::find_button, _InterfaceStruct::invert_selection, _InterfaceStruct::layer_active, _InterfaceStruct::results, screen, _InterfaceStruct::table, and _InterfaceStruct::top_parts_selection.

Referenced by create_search_window().

GtkWidget* create_search_results_section (  void   ) 
 

creates the lower part of the search parts dialog.

displays the selected (highlighted) and unselected rows
multiple selections are possible
right clicking or double clicking on one item results in immediate display of part in main window
only four columns are shown (recognisable by COLUMN_ instead of column),
but all columns from pick and place file are actually in the list;

void select_by_regex (  GtkWidget *  widget,
gpointer  data
) 
 

allows selections by search strings utilising regular expressions where available.

default mode is searching in designators, comments are also searchable
employs a completion model based on the pick and place file for straightforward location of a specific part

Definition at line 99 of file search_gui.c.

References _InterfaceStruct::check_comment, _InterfaceStruct::check_designator, completion_model, _InterfaceStruct::file_is_named_entry, _InterfaceStruct::model, _InterfaceStruct::selection, and _InterfaceStruct::tree.

void update_combo_box_model (  void   ) 
 

Updates list of available layers.

Often used, since any change in the layers must be reflected by the selectable layers list in the search dialog.

Definition at line 607 of file search_gui.c.

References _InterfaceStruct::layer_active, _InterfaceStruct::layer_select_active, and screen.

Variable Documentation

pnp_state_t* parsed_PNP_data
 

captures all pick and place data in a netlist style.

Is intended to be also used e.g. for reloading files
